txt.en: 'I no longer have the iron I need to build the braces to support the failing bridges.\n\n'The Ghâsh-hai have many iron weapons. If you were to collect some and bring them to me, I could melt them down and be able to make what we need. You can find the Ghâsh-hai roving all over the Flaming Deeps.'
'These swords will work perfectly. I will put them into the crucible, and they should be melted down in a short time.'
'It will take many Ghâsh-hai swords, but it is the one source of iron that is abundant in these halls.'
In order to repair the bridges in the Flaming Deeps, the dwarves need iron to forge braces and supports.

Ghâsh-hai swords can be found on the Ghâsh-hai, roving throughout the Flaming Deeps.\n\nUlfied needs Ghâsh-hai swords to melt down so he will have the iron necessary to build repair struts for the bridges.
Bring the Ghâsh-hai swords to Ulfied at The Cross-roads of Ash
Ulfied is at The Cross-roads of Ash, in the south-west portion of the Flaming Deeps.\n\nUlfied will want to begin melting down the Ghâsh-hai swords as soon as possible.
